description: A four-year-old girl was filmed riding a motorbike as her father sits behind her. The footage was recorded on March 2 in Haikou, China's Henan province.
title: Four-year-old girl rides a motorcycle along a busy street
title_page: Four-year-old girl rides a motorcycle along a busy street | Daily Mail Online
text:
For most children, it's fun to pretend you're driving a car or a motorbike.
This young girl in China was spotted having a great time driving a real motorbike as her father sits behind her.
The footage was recorded on March 2 in Haikou, China's Hainan province.
All fun and games: At one point the girl manages to overtake a tuk tuk
Video footage shows the girl driving the motorcycle while her father sits behind her.
It's thought that the girl is four years old.
The footage was recorded in Haikou, China's Hainan province.
She didn't appear to be unphased by being in control of the vehicle.
The four-year-old girl was spotted riding her father's motorcycle in Hainan, China
Her father seems calm and relaxed as she passes traffic at speed on the busy road.
She also manages to overtake a tuk tuk.
Motorcycles are a popular choice of transport in China with many families spotted using them to get around.
